metadata.title: CVE-2014-7913 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The print_option function in dhcp-common.c in dhcpcd through 6.9.1, as usedin dhcp.c in dhcpcd 5.x in Android before 5.1 and other products,misinterprets the return value of the snprintf function, which allowsremote DHCP servers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(memory corruption) via a crafted message.

criterions.comment: dhcpcd5 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
dhcpcd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
